description.value: Description: Codes for HL7 publishing sections (major business categories)

definition.value: Description: Represents the HL7 V3 publishing section that deals with the administration and management of health care activities and organizations. UsageNote: V3 Specifications are published in a set of "domains", which contain interactions and related specifications for a single area of health care within which can be supported by a single, coherent set of interoperability specifications. For publishing purposes, these domains are aggregated into sub-sections of related health care areas and these sub-sections are further aggregated into three major sets.
